#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define MAXN 100005
#define m 1000000007
long long fact[MAXN];
int T,N,K;
 
int pow(long long a, int b)
{
    long long temp;
    if(b==1)return a;
    if(b&1)return (a*(long long)pow(a,b-1))%m;
    temp=pow(a,b/2);
    return (temp*temp)%m;
}
int invFact(long long num)
{
    return pow(num,m-2);
}
int main()
{
    fact[1]=fact[0]=1;
    for(int i=2;i<MAXN;i++)
    {
        fact[i]=(fact[i-1]*i)%m;
    }
 
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        cin>>N>>K;
        if(K>N){cout<<0<<endl;continue;}
        cout<<((long long)(fact[N]*invFact(fact[N-K]))%m*invFact(fact[K]))%m<<endl;
 
    }
    return 0;
}
